description.value:
You can create extraordinary-albeit volatile-alchemical wonders, though they have an unfortunate tendency to violently explode when you use them.

When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Quick Alchemy], you can create an alchemical item from your formula book whose level is up to 2 higher than your advanced alchemy level. You can spend up to 3 additional batches of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Infused Reagents] when creating this item to stabilize it.

Upon activating the item, attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:10]; for every additional batch of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Infused Reagents] you spent to create the item, reduce this DC by 2. On a success, the item functions normally. On a failure, the item explodes, dealing force damage to the user equal to twice the item's level (doubled on a critical failure).
